title: If Adam Sandler Dubbs a Japanese Anime
body:
Even though I prefer not to watch Japanese anime that's been eng dub when I can appreciate its storyline and artwork more in its original Japanese language, I'd do it if Adam Sandler did the dub. Male, female, gay Russian sushi bar bouncer, who cares which character(s) he voice acts for - that guy is awesomely entertaining.

To put it into context, I can enjoy watching some of his movies again as much as I do with Marvel's movies on Iron Man or The Avengers which is more than I do rewatching say Star Wars... I went there...

What are your thoughts on this for people who either enjoy anime or like Adam Sandler's works.
